businessProfile.name: Burgers & Barley
businessProfile.address: 13299 Teal Rdg Wy Ste PD-J2, Riverton, UT 84096, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 13299 Teal Rdg Wy Ste PD-J2, Riverton, UT 84096, USA

reviews.text: Almost did not stop by as I thought it was a bar from the description food is served with beer. There is no alcohol on the menu, just a regular fast food spot in a food court.  Was very pleasantly surprised at the good food we got. The portion was very generous and one of the few times could not eat my entire hamburger. Also got the spudilicious fries, and wow those were good. Service was quite slow being the only customer at the moment, but was worth the wait. A must try.  Requiring a tip for ordering my food at the counter, seating myself, and cleaning up for myself is always a sore spot. #notipfornoservice and always drops my score a tad. The price was well within reason .

Great little counter service restaurant located in a corner of Mountain View Village.  It‚Äôs one of several in the building with a food court type set up.
Windows line the back wall .. overlooking a dancing fountain.
The food is delicious. Made fresh and served hot .. the ingredients are made fresh and cooked to order.  Eclectic combinations on the burgers.

Definitely a new spot for a good burger.

Great little place in a small food court (there was only 2 restaurants there with room for a third) in the Riverton Mountain View Village outdoor mall. Great food, large portions, and not much service to give - they buzz your number and you get your food. The sweet potato fries were tender and amazing and the burger was delicious and messy. The only down part would have been the small portion of fry sauce given; the small container was just over half full.

This is located inside a kind of small food court area. We met the owner and he was so good to us and our kids. We tried a few different burgers and the kids sliders and mac and cheese. The burgers are made with good quality ingredients and were cooked well. The fries were awesome. They are different than any fry I have ever had, almost like an English chip. We loved them though and will absolutely be back. Come support this family, you won't regret it!

The food here was pretty good.  We all loved the fries.  The burgers were good too, but could have used some more flavor. I ordered the Hot Pants Burger, and while delicious it was anything but hot.  It had jalapeno peppers, but all of the heat had been removed from them, only leaving them with the jalapeno flavoring.

recentReviews.text: The burgers here are a must have. They‚Äôre so incredibly good you wouldn‚Äôt believe it, specially for the price. This is one of those hidden gems

The food was alright, but to be honest for how much we paid for our kids and the taste of the food itself, it felt kind of overpriced for what we got. The service was fine. I just really wish it felt more worth it.
Great customer service. I had the Outlaw‚Äîdefinitely a solid choice. Highly  recommend!
The staff was very nice and welcoming. I got the Gorgonzola burger and it was fantastic!

Great little place in a small food court (there was only 2 restaurants there with room for a third) in the Riverton Mountain View Village outdoor mall. Great food, large portions, and not much service to give - they buzz your number and you get your food. The sweet potato fries were tender and amazing and the burger was delicious and messy. The only down part would have been the small portion of fry sauce given; the small container was just over half full.
Food is good, the hamburgers and fries are tasty and they serve a lot of food. A little expensive but the Aloha is worth it.
The Utah county location was better quality than this location. Enjoyed the ambiance here.

detailedReviews.author: Jalvin Urruchurto
detailedReviews.text: Mala atencion

detailedReviews.author: Josue Amaya
detailedReviews.text: The burgers here are a must have. They‚Äôre so incredibly good you wouldn‚Äôt believe it, specially for the price. This is one of those hidden gems

detailedReviews.author: Michaela Candelario
detailedReviews.text: The food was alright, but to be honest for how much we paid for our kids and the taste of the food itself, it felt kind of overpriced for what we got. The service was fine. I just really wish it felt more worth it.

detailedReviews.author: Adam York
detailedReviews.text: Very good!

detailedReviews.author: Stroll With Joel
detailedReviews.text: Great customer service. I had the Outlaw‚Äîdefinitely a solid choice. Highly  recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Trevor Astin
detailedReviews.text: The staff was very nice and welcoming. I got the Gorgonzola burger and it was fantastic!

detailedReviews.author: Merrick Fonnesbeck
detailedReviews.text: Great little place in a small food court (there was only 2 restaurants there with room for a third) in the Riverton Mountain View Village outdoor mall. Great food, large portions, and not much service to give - they buzz your number and you get your food. The sweet potato fries were tender and amazing and the burger was delicious and messy. The only down part would have been the small portion of fry sauce given; the small container was just over half full.

detailedReviews.author: E M
detailedReviews.text: Cali burger was great

detailedReviews.author: Maria Macabi
detailedReviews.text: Food is good, the hamburgers and fries are tasty and they serve a lot of food. A little expensive but the Aloha is worth it.

detailedReviews.author: RyanChloe Ball
detailedReviews.text: The Utah county location was better quality than this location. Enjoyed the ambiance here.

detailedReviews.author: Jairo Carvajal
detailedReviews.text: Really good food... burgers are very good, fries are awesome.... I had a chicken taco salad and it did not dissapoint.

detailedReviews.author: Robert Fitch
detailedReviews.text: The chicken pesto is a 10/10

detailedReviews.author: Kendall
detailedReviews.text: Honestly the best burger and fries I think I have ever had! It is actually that good that eveytime we pass it, even if we just ate, we have to at least get some fries. The service is always amazing and they also offer gluten free buns for those with allergies! We usually get the Johnny and it is amazing! If you haven‚Äôt eaten here you need to!

detailedReviews.author: Von Neilson
detailedReviews.text: Almost did not stop by as I thought it was a bar from the description food is served with beer. There is no alcohol on the menu, just a regular fast food spot in a food court.  Was very pleasantly surprised at the good food we got. The portion was very generous and one of the few times could not eat my entire hamburger. Also got the spudilicious fries, and wow those were good. Service was quite slow being the only customer at the moment, but was worth the wait. A must try.  Requiring a tip for ordering my food at the counter, seating myself, and cleaning up for myself is always a sore spot. #notipfornoservice and always drops my score a tad. The price was well within reason .

detailedReviews.author: Cannon Marriott
detailedReviews.text: Pineapple burger may be the best burger I‚Äôve had in years. I love burgers and this was a home run.

detailedReviews.author: Muai Family Enterprises
detailedReviews.text:
Great little counter service restaurant located in a corner of Mountain View Village.  It‚Äôs one of several in the building with a food court type set up.
Windows line the back wall .. overlooking a dancing fountain.
The food is delicious. Made fresh and served hot .. the ingredients are made fresh and cooked to order.  Eclectic combinations on the burgers.

Definitely a new spot for a good burger.

detailedReviews.author: Jamie Wilcox
detailedReviews.text: Got the good life and the home fries. The burger was impossible to eat because the toppings made the bun soggy. The patty itself was not fresh. It was perfectly round and the same thickness like it was machine pressed. Reminded me of the frozen loaf of burgers at Walmart. Weirdly enough with all of those toppings the burger lacked flavor. No seasoning. One note the whole way through. They also forgot my fries but it was a to go and dumbly didn't check before it got home. Very expensive for the quality.

detailedReviews.author: Nathan Lockard
detailedReviews.text: Expensive, gourmet burgers

detailedReviews.author: Daniel Gonsalves
detailedReviews.text:
Came here with friends and was presently surprised at the burgers we got. They weren‚Äôt life changing but they hit the spot and were better than most chains. This is a food court style seating restaurant with other restaurants around.

My wife got the Philly cheesesteak and I had a few bites. We were both surprised since Utah doesn‚Äôt generally have good Philly cheesesteaks but this one was good.

Would return, great fries, great burgers, average but attentive young employees that were great.

detailedReviews.author: Jake Dean
detailedReviews.text: This is my second time here and I really love it. I had the Aloha burger and sweet potato fries. It‚Äôs so much food! And that burger is so incredible for the price ($11). Service was great, they cook to order. I‚Äôll be back!

detailedReviews.author: Nathan Leavitt
detailedReviews.text: They do a great job. Great food. Same price as a nearby chain and way better.

detailedReviews.author: Annette N. Dutson
detailedReviews.text:
The food was really good. The fries especially. We thought when we received them they would be chips,  but they are just shaped like chips, so that was a nice surprise.

The prices are not too bad either.

detailedReviews.author: C.j. Latimer
detailedReviews.text: Great burgers, new style of fries I‚Äôve never had this version of before. Highly recommend trying this place out! Was expecting beer availability with barely being part of the name.  Sadly no beers,

detailedReviews.author: Justin Jamison
detailedReviews.text: The food was pretty good, nothing to rave about, but decent. However, the service was super slow. And I was there during the lunch hour when it ought to be busy (it wasn't). The lady took 15 minutes to get me my food when there wasn't anyone else waiting.

detailedReviews.author: Jeffrey Western
detailedReviews.text: This place is amazing! The burgers are huge and fill you up, way better than the shake shack across the street!! The fries are crispy, fluffy and definitely better than fast food fries! They‚Äôre new menu additions of the pork burrito and philly cheesteak give a little more variety, and if you like a little spice, the burrito has a little kick to it!

detailedReviews.author: L. W.
detailedReviews.text: This is my absolute favorite burger place! It's at a small food court in the mall, but seriously makes the best burgers. The fries are amazing, too! You'll wait a minute, because it's freshly cooked; but so worth it!

detailedReviews.author: Rosalinda Marquez
detailedReviews.text: Excelente

detailedReviews.author: Jack Falkenrath
detailedReviews.text: Service was friendly and the fries were good. Unfortunately, the sandwiches did not match our expectations. We had the Aloha and the Johnny. The Johnny was too salty and the ‚Äústeak‚Äù seemed very processed. In addition, my partner commented that her Aloha burger was underwhelming.

detailedReviews.author: Maria Del Rio
detailedReviews.text: This place was super delicious. We had the Philly cheese Steak and the B&BW fries so good. Very friendly and nice atmosphere. Will come again.. highly recommend it.

detailedReviews.author: Jeffrey Crossley
detailedReviews.text: The food here was pretty good.  We all loved the fries.  The burgers were good too, but could have used some more flavor. I ordered the Hot Pants Burger, and while delicious it was anything but hot.  It had jalapeno peppers, but all of the heat had been removed from them, only leaving them with the jalapeno flavoring.

detailedReviews.author: Alejandra QD
detailedReviews.text:
This is a cozy place with great burgers. The price-food relation is amazing, big portions, good prices üçî
My husband and I spent just 35 dollars for two Johnny burgers and fries üçü
He eats a lot haha and it was enough for him üôå

detailedReviews.author: Luis Gerardo Jimenez
detailedReviews.text: Friendly service, food was amazing. For this place being a food court the atmosphere was great.

detailedReviews.author: daniel fullmer
detailedReviews.text: I had a great experience here today. This restaurant offers a quality product. Their sandwichs are excellent. Also, their staff is friendly and accommodating. Plus, the ambiance of this location is comfortable. Overall, this location is worth trying.

detailedReviews.author: Sherri Ann Lewis
detailedReviews.text: Food wasn't as ordered.  We ordered a Hawaiian, snd didn't get that.  So that was sad.  Everyone else got theirs correct.  The Food IS AWESOME, so good!

detailedReviews.author: Cathy Leslie
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic burger (outlaw) and home fries!! My daughter got the kids meal (sliders, drink and fries and it was just the right amount!) Service is a tad slow, but worth the wait!

detailedReviews.author: Gary Shunk
detailedReviews.text:
First time I went there they messed up on two parts of my order didn't give me the fries I paid for. And there was no bacon on my hamburger.

Won't go there again wasn't impressed.

detailedReviews.author: David M
detailedReviews.text: The Riverton location is in a small food court area. The area and the atmosphere is a little weird but their burgers are excellent!

detailedReviews.author: Princess Larrea Luna
detailedReviews.text: My favorite burger place in utah. The staff are so nice and the food is always so yummy. I recommend this place so much!!

detailedReviews.author: Joshua Cambra
detailedReviews.text: This is located inside a kind of small food court area. We met the owner and he was so good to us and our kids. We tried a few different burgers and the kids sliders and mac and cheese. The burgers are made with good quality ingredients and were cooked well. The fries were awesome. They are different than any fry I have ever had, almost like an English chip. We loved them though and will absolutely be back. Come support this family, you won't regret it!

detailedReviews.author: Kortney Buchanan
detailedReviews.text: Was one of the best burgers I‚Äôve had in a while. The fries were crispy and thick. Absolutely loved it and the server was amazing.

detailedReviews.author: Donna May ‚ÄúLady earth goddess‚Äù
detailedReviews.text: They had the best unique delicious fries I've ever had. I never had fries like this before. I got the Aloha Burger which was delicious . The food came out fresh, quick and hot just the man that served us. üòúThank you!

detailedReviews.author: Callie Coombs
detailedReviews.text: The food was delightful and the service was fast. Loved the fries. Music added to a great atmosphere.

detailedReviews.author: Caroline Norris
detailedReviews.text: My favorite burger place!!! The fries are the best I‚Äôve ever had and the customer service is great

detailedReviews.author: James
detailedReviews.text:
Absolute Piss poor customer service!
I have called and called and called and CALLED! 6 Times today and 5 times yesterday. Trying to inquire about accommodations for a large group.
I have questions. They ABSOLUTELY REFUSE to answer their phones. Piss poor employees. You just lost money.
And to anyone wondering. This location does not have beer like the others.
Garbage üóëÔ∏èüóëÔ∏è How can you call yourselves burgers and Barley....You ain't even serving any barley.....Stupid.
Avoid this restaurant. Why would I want to go to a restaurant that won't even pick up a phone call?

detailedReviews.author: Jon Raulston
detailedReviews.text: Great burgers and very unique fries I definitely recommend trying them.

detailedReviews.author: Adam Roberts
detailedReviews.text: This place is pretty great but I like the American Fork location a bit more. The burgers are delicious, but not quite as good as the ones in AF. The service was decent, but it took a while to get our food. Overall pretty good burger joint.

detailedReviews.author: Deb Pham
detailedReviews.text: Great burgers! Very juicy and unique flavors. Amazing service and quick to grab a bite to eat before your movie at the Cinemark. YUM.

detailedReviews.author: Cristian Chavez
detailedReviews.text: The host is AMAZING!!! He was so kind and understanding, very knowledgeable and genuine. I recommend this place based on all accounts! Great restaurant :)

detailedReviews.author: Nikki Wiggins
detailedReviews.text: Love this place! I seriously CRAVE their fries! I cant Remember the gentleman‚Äôs name, but he is always so kind and patient. Good food takes time, so be patient as their food is all fresh!

detailedReviews.author: Ailene Hansen
detailedReviews.text: Every time I come here for lunch on my break, the owner is so nice! And the food is great!

detailedReviews.author: Jennifer Brown
detailedReviews.text: The burger was juicy and nice sauce for the fries and the fries are awesome!!the burger maybe just needs a little bit more sauce‚Ä¶..

detailedReviews.author: Spencer Thompson
detailedReviews.text: The Johnny was really good and spudlicious fries were really good would highly recommend this

detailedReviews.author: Giuseppe M
detailedReviews.text: Burger johnny was awesome, spudilicious fries were good but I didn‚Äôt love the pineapple and bbq on fries. Customer service is good.

detailedReviews.author: Derry Curtis
detailedReviews.text: YOUR RESTRAUNT WAS OPEN... at 3am and we made a burger thanks maN

detailedReviews.author: Jordan H
detailedReviews.text:
Edit: We just keep going and they just keep doing great! We've never had a wait issue again and the food is always delicious! Their service is excellent and this has become one of our top favorite places!

We were going to rate them 4 stars because they said it would be 12-15 minutes and it took 30, but their food was just too dang good!! My wife and I ordered the Meat Man and the Johnny and split it and it was the best decision we had made in weeks. Both of them were so good!! The fries were cut in a way I've never seen before but they were perfectly cooked and salted so they were amazing too! The price was higher than most burger places we go to, but it was comparable in price to Cafe Rio and Mo Betta's (two of our other favorites) and it tasted better than either of them. Highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Evie Feil
detailedReviews.text: So many delicious options, best fries I've ever had. Staff was very kind and helpful. Will be coming again

detailedReviews.author: Johnny Arellano
detailedReviews.text: As a Johnny, I have to first off say that while I may be biased, the Johnny Burger was definitely delicious. Juicy, messy flavor in ya mouth. The Spudlicious fries were honestly mid. Throw some pulled pork on them and they‚Äôd be fire though, sheeeesh. The restaurant itself is lacking in that it‚Äôs inside of a food-hall shared with other restaurants, thus lacking some identity. Wish they had a location in SLC but prices are low enough that the drive there is worth it.

detailedReviews.author: Suzanne Plympton
detailedReviews.text: The dining area is shared with 4 restaurants. It is not fancy but  was a really a good burger.

detailedReviews.author: Noah P
detailedReviews.text: The burgers were good but the fries were pretty dry. For the price you might prefer stack 571 or Shake Shack. It took just over 20 minutes to get our food.

detailedReviews.author: Rafael Vicencio
detailedReviews.text: Excelente servicio y calidad en las Hamburguesas la verdad s√∫per recomendable la atenci√≥n del personal excelente un establecimiento no de comida r√°pida, ya que lo que yo dir√≠a es un lugar donde se cocina como en casa. Felicidades sin lugar a duda el mejor lugar donde comer una Hamburguesa

detailedReviews.author: Carmen Sanchez
detailedReviews.text: La atenci√≥n muy buena y las hamburguesas con French fries deliciosas‚Ä¶ Altamente recomendado üîùüîù

detailedReviews.author: Cox Hermoza Peirano
detailedReviews.text:
Atenci√≥n excelente y la comida s√∫per buena
Fresca y al punto exacto
10 puntos

detailedReviews.author: Cesar Baldini
detailedReviews.text: Good customer service and the burger wasn't the best but was good.

detailedReviews.author: Natalie Brockbank
detailedReviews.text: Incredible burgers and AMAZING fries. Service was quick and the help was amazing.

detailedReviews.author: Nachman Laufman
detailedReviews.text: Had hot pants burger and chili cheese fries. Mind blowing. SIX STARS!!! Good pricing. Support gourmet food courts. Found this place via dirty bird which closed down.

detailedReviews.author: Sean Levesque
detailedReviews.text: Went to movie last night, stopped at the Burgers & Barley shop located out front. The "food court" arrangement didn't inspire great expectations - but this place went above and beyond! The food was excellent, the staff at the kiosk was extremely attentive, the prices were not bad, and the food court staff kept the place very clean. Very pleasant surprise!

detailedReviews.author: Cory Anderson
detailedReviews.text: One of the best burgers I‚Äôve ever had!

detailedReviews.author: Jared Michael Hunt
detailedReviews.text: Little understaffed but the staff they do have really care about making good food and giving good service. Atmosphere is just a little food court type thing so, meh.

detailedReviews.author: Liliana Eastley
detailedReviews.text:
I'm always looking for food with flavor and good quality. I found a nice variety of combinations of flavor on these hamburgers and they had good seasonings. I loved that the meat was decent thick and looked natural not mixed with flour or other things. It made a little party of flavors in my mouth. Until now, the best hamburger I have tried in Utah. I don't have a picture because I ate it so fast! Delicious!
The place is inside the food court but it doesn't look like a food court, it looks like a nice fancy restaurant. Nice environment, some options more in a taste for adults like ramen and coffee.

detailedReviews.author: Your Ladyship
detailedReviews.text: Terrible. I‚Äôm okay with hints of spice, but I don‚Äôt get spice to this degree and why it has to be on EVERYTHING! I don‚Äôt get why people like it. It‚Äôs always the same flavor and subdues other great flavors. I asked for no spice and didn‚Äôt have anything without it. I‚Äôll never come back.

detailedReviews.author: Yhon Guerrero Yhon
detailedReviews.text: Excelente comida y lugar,,buena atenci√≥n

detailedReviews.author: Thomas Pena
detailedReviews.text:
Perfection! Great burgers, great attention. Very fair prices. I‚Äôm still savoring those fries‚Ä¶
5 stars is an understatement. Thank you guys!

detailedReviews.author: Cody Storch
detailedReviews.text: The best place in the MVV food court, and easily the best burgers around.  It's been great every time I've eaten here.

detailedReviews.author: Whitney Bowden
detailedReviews.text: Such great burgers! You can tell that they are fresh made patties. My boyfriend got the Meat Man and it was huge. It's on the spicy side but we like spice so we were happy. I got The Outlaw, which was equally huge. The sauce that's on the burger is so good. The burgers do not come with fries, but for $3 you get a decent side of fries. We shared the fries and couldn't finish them. They come with fry sauce that has some seasoning in it. The fries are probably some of the best fries we've ever had! We order two beers and due to whatever rules Utah has for them they can't serve the beer in the bottle, so it came in a red solo cup. Could be due to the food court atmosphere and kids being around? I don't know. The gentleman that helped us was really nice and helped me decide on a burger. He was friendly and had great conversation. All in all we loved it and will be back to try other burgers!

detailedReviews.author: Zac V
detailedReviews.text: Great food and awesome service

detailedReviews.author: Danny Rivas
detailedReviews.text: Excellent!!! 3 Sundays in a row eating here and we love it

detailedReviews.author: Christian Gonzalez
detailedReviews.text: I just went at 3:00pm or around 3pm and I had the Aloha Burger and got the Cheesy Barbecue fries and right now is 4:40pm and i'm in the toilet my stomach hurts!! I will not be coming back what the heck!!! Also I didn't payed my friend payed with her debit card so obviously you are not going to find anything on my name. Please whatever you did today fix it or others will get sick to.

detailedReviews.author: Nor
detailedReviews.text: Best burger in Utah deeds

detailedReviews.author: Chasen Whitehead
detailedReviews.text: I had the meat man and it was great! Located inside a food court and the Mrs wanted ramen so you can‚Äôt beat that!

detailedReviews.author: Kevin Sanchez
detailedReviews.text: Extremely delicious burgers. I‚Äôve had the meat man and the outlaw and both were some of the best burgers I‚Äôve had. I‚Äôd say stay away from the Gorgonzola burger. The fries can‚Äôt be any better. Unfortunately the time I went they didn‚Äôt have any salads, so check first if that is something important.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.5/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers rave about the delicious and unique burger combinations, such as the Gorgonzola and Pineapple burgers, which are described as some of the best they've ever had. - social media marketing can showcase this strength

The generous portions and great value for the price, especially highlighted by the Aloha burger and sweet potato fries, are frequently praised by customers. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
The consistently great customer service, with staff being described as nice, welcoming, and attentive, enhances the overall dining experience. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
improvementOpportunities: Long wait times and slow service - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Negative reviews and reputation issues, particularly regarding customer service and order accuracy - review management can address this concern
Lack of atmosphere/ambiance awareness and confusion about the restaurant's concept - social media marketing can improve this area

positive.text: The burgers here are a must have. They‚Äôre so incredibly good you wouldn‚Äôt believe it, specially for the price. This is one of those hidden gems

positive.author: Stroll With Joel
positive.text: Great customer service. I had the Outlaw‚Äîdefinitely a solid choice. Highly  recommend!

neutral.author: Michaela Candelario
neutral.text: The food was alright, but to be honest for how much we paid for our kids and the taste of the food itself, it felt kind of overpriced for what we got. The service was fine. I just really wish it felt more worth it.

neutral.author: Jack Falkenrath
neutral.text: Service was friendly and the fries were good. Unfortunately, the sandwiches did not match our expectations. We had the Aloha and the Johnny. The Johnny was too salty and the ‚Äústeak‚Äù seemed very processed. In addition, my partner commented that her Aloha burger was underwhelming.

negative.author: Jamie Wilcox
negative.text: Got the good life and the home fries. The burger was impossible to eat because the toppings made the bun soggy. The patty itself was not fresh. It was perfectly round and the same thickness like it was machine pressed. Reminded me of the frozen loaf of burgers at Walmart. Weirdly enough with all of those toppings the burger lacked flavor. No seasoning. One note the whole way through. They also forgot my fries but it was a to go and dumbly didn't check before it got home. Very expensive for the quality.

negative.author: Gary Shunk
negative.text:
First time I went there they messed up on two parts of my order didn't give me the fries I paid for. And there was no bacon on my hamburger.

Won't go there again wasn't impressed.

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
